author: Simon Difford
description: Some may want to use a Demerara sugar syrup but pure cane sugar delicately mellows the malt whisky without masking its flavour, indeed it amplifies its character.
name: Speyside Single Malt Old Fashioned
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
